import React from 'react'; import { Modal } from './Modal'; export const AboutModal = ({ isOpen, onClose }) => { return (

Our Mission

Verified Text Editor was created to help nurture the next generation of writers and thinkers. In an age of AI intervention, this tool empowers students and professionals to practice and perfect their craft authentically.

We believe in the value of genuine human creativity and original thought. This platform provides verification that your work is truly yours, while giving teachers and publishers confidence in the authenticity of submitted content.

How It Works

  • Track your writing process: Every keystroke, pause, and edit is recorded
  • Annotate pasted content: Distinguish between quotes, citations, and original work
  • Generate certificates: Create cryptographically-signed verification files
  • Privacy-first: All data stays on your device - we don't store anything

Created By

Van Phan

Built with dedication to authentic learning and genuine craftsmanship.

"In a world increasingly automated, the ability to create, think, and write authentically is more valuable than ever. This tool helps preserve and prove that authenticity."

); };
